channel.title: Mundial 2009 on Simba Tango

item.title: ¡Mucha mierda en el mundial!
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
by  Simba tango

Tonight is the night of the final of the mundial (world championship) of tango salon. While I always found the idea of a competition in social dancing somewhat absurd, it happens that for the last couple of years several friends have been among the finalists, and that made it all more interesting.

It all starts at 1900 local time, and rumors have it there will be live broadcast, and I will try to catch it.

Good luck, my friends!

¡Mucha mierda, chicos!

UPDATE: No luck with the webcast, unfortunately, only football there…
